title: I can't change my summoner spells for some reason when I'm in champion selection
body: When I am in champion selection I can not change my summoner spells and one of them is disabled so I only have one summoner spell in game can anyone help me I tried a full repair and still did not resolve it?

replies.body:
Looks like this account is level 6, so it won't have access to all of the summoner spells quite yet. They unlock as you level up your Summoner level.

If it's stuck on one you can't use for some reason, do a quick config reset and that should set things back to default.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
